title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: A classic 35mm rangefinder camera from the 1950s, prized for its precision engineering and timeless design.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: A vintage Gibson SG with original hardware and a warm, powerful tone — a true collector’s piece for musicians.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: Apple’s first Macintosh computer, fully functional and in excellent condition — a milestone in computing history.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: A luxury diver’s watch with automatic movement, stainless steel case, and timeless design — a symbol of prestige.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A rare first edition of the 1925 classic novel, featuring its iconic original dust jacket — a literary treasure.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: An original Eames lounge chair and ottoman in rosewood and leather — an icon of modern furniture design.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: An authenticated screen print by the mysterious street artist Banksy, accompanied by a certificate of authenticity.
